description: SOXL will probably enter into a period of consolidation after such rapid gains.  Thus I wish to see here the viability of investing into an Iron Condor.  Although one point of concern is the narrow profitability range.
entrance_condition: Since we are wishing for a drop in volatility, I believe it wiser to wait for the appearance of bottoms.
exit_condition: Exit while at least 10 days in.
